Bewusster und gut implementierter Horrorfaktor besitzt dieses Spiel nicht!
Jedoch punktet das Spiel mit einer guten Soundkulisse und einer großen Menge
Spielspaß über kurze Zeiträume. Gerade an Tagen, an denen nicht viel Zeit übrig bleibt,
um sich genüsslich einigier "Tripple A" Titel hinzugeben, bietet  dieses Spiel durch seine kurzen
Rundenzeiten, eine wohltuende Abwechslung.

Jeu solo : impossible de trouver de parties a plusieurs... 
Quand c'est pour ajouter des monstres cheaté la y'a du dev mais pour resoudre les bugs y'a plus personne !!!!
Ну что я могу сказать...Игра расчитана на даунов и потому я здесь.

Best Lobby Simulator 2017 !

Just try to join with any of your friends, and enjoy the 30 minutes delay before having a 50% chance to join a game !
Now features 5 minutes of additional waiting on any lobby !

[b]For the devs :[/b]
Please enhance the match finder, it's definitely ruining everyone's experience on the game. The more people quit this game, the harder it is to find games...

В этой игре вы найдете идеальных тиммейтов, которые всегда помогут вам и заблочат маньяка, чтобы вы спаслитесь. Именно здесь маньяк НИКОГДА НЕ КЕМПЕРИТ, и здесь никто до начала игры не напишет, что все нубы и не расскажет много нового о наших родителях.  





Но это не точно.

Dead by Daylight дает на выбор игру за выжившего или маньяка, у каждого персонажа есть прокачка способностей и благодаря этому игра становиться очень интересной и разнообразной. Каждый маньяк уникален и обладает своей особенностью, и помимо стандартных маньяков есть дополнительные DLC с маньяками. Выжившие тоже обладают своими особенностями, но это не так круто. Так жк в игре хорошое музыкально сопровождение и различные мелочи 
Итог:
8/10, так как есть траблы
Советую для игры с друзьями, а так из минусов немного багов, но это мультиплеер и он затягивает на долго.

Идеальная игра (лично моё мнение). 
1. Хуёвое настроение - играй за маньяка
2. Ахyеное настроение - играй за сурва
3. Кому то сначала покажется, что маньяки имба. Это не так. Это не маньяк имба, а тимейты идиoты. Запомните это.
4. Единственная игра которую я не считаю помойкой 
5. Пожалуйста, пожалуйста не спасайте всей тимой одного сурва, который весит на крюке. 

Ну а тот, кто ещё думает покупать ли эту игру.. Покупайте конечно, получше кс и доты будет это уж точно.
Ах да, чуть не забыл. Сурвы, играйте нормально и не токсите, иначе маньяк вас будет кемпить всю игру, и это только испортит ваше настроение.
Ну а маньяки... Не будьте тварями, вы же всё таки люди как никак, хоть раз давайте шансы сурвам.
Всем удачной игры.
Проиграл мало, но игра понравилась. Веселее, да и проще играть с кентами, так как напрники обычно по эволюции не догоняют и табуреток.Весело, напряжно, баги есть, но несзначительные.

This game was fun once. Then the community and the devs ruined it. The devs decided to fix what wasn't broken while ignoring the glaring flaws, while the community now feels entitled to win as survivors. I've had people complain and report me for killing them, the whole objective of the game! If the devs get it together and the community softens up, this is still a fun game. It's just been torn apart and doesn't have that fun anymore.

Also 95% of the game is waiting to find 4 other people to play with.

Very fun and enjoyable when played with friends or in short lengths of time. The frustrating bugs and often seemingly unbalanced dynamic of a 1 vs 4 game make can really burn you out after awhile. I recommend in that case to just go play something else, like maybe Civ 5, for awhile to take a break. 

Overall, 8/10. Pretty good job so far.

NOTE: This review was made in early 2017. The game has changes a lot since then so you might want to read a more recent review instead.

[b][u]Dead by Daylight[/u][/b]

The game isn't perfect, I'll admit that. It's far from perfect actually. The game can be a bit broken sometimes, but the devs have managed to fix some things; playing alone (as survivor) used to be broken as fuck which resulted in restarting your game over and over but they pretty much fixed all those issues when queueing alone in recent patches. If you're playing with friends however, it can often take forever to find it game, but they made it a little bit better with recent updates (can still take a while though). There are some things that need rebalancing but every game has that problem every now and then. The community can be pretty toxic but it's alright.
Appart from all the queueing issues, I think this game is great. This game is probably my most played multi-player game of 2017 so far and I'm not even close to getting bored of it.

[b]Now to the actual good things about the game that people care about.[/b]
Are you scared because you think this is a horror game and you don't like horror games? Don't be. This game is only actually scary the first couple of hours you play when you have no idea what's going on and because of that use Premonition & Spine Chill. Once you actually got to know how it works the "horror" genre is not very relevant anymore for this game.
This game is also surprisingly competitive and tactical, which isn't necessarely a good or bad thing, it might just motivate or demotivate some players; It has some sort of ranking system, communication actually gives you a big advantage, sound is EXTREMELY important (mainly when playing killer), there goes a lot of skill into trying to dodge / catch, etc.
The game also might seem repetitive and it can be, but somehow it stays fun and every trial you play feels like something new. There's about 20+ maps I think as of today, which is a great number to keep every trial feel fresh and different but also to make it not too hard for "pro" players to learn all the maps out of their head.

[b]One last con:[/b] the game can be very frustrating at some times. When you're playing killer and the survivors sabotage all your hooks for example, there nothing you can do. Nothing. Or when playing survivor and the killer is facecamping you which makes it nearly impossible to get rescued and you're as good as dead. This doesn't happen very often though, so that's great.

[b]Final thoughts:[/b]

[b]Pros:[/b]
-Addictive
-Not repetitive
-Competitive, tactical and skill based (could also be a con)
-It can be a lot of fun with friends
-Also fun when playing solo (if you play killer you always have to play solo anyway)
-Cheaters are very rare (I've only encountered a confirmed cheater once in all my hours)

[b]Cons:[/b]
-Can be frustrating
-Pretty salty/toxic community (there's also a lot of nice people but there's just more toxic players than friendly players for what I've seen)
-Could use some rebalances
-There's a fair amount of bugs but most of them aren't really game-breaking in my opinion

Overall, I'd give this game a solid [b]8/10[/b]. The game has its flaws, but it's still a lot of fun.

Thanks for reading!

EDIT: Most queueing issues have been fixed with recent patches. This game might deserve an even higher score now.

This game is great except the people who play it are another unholy level of crybaby. Everything you do warrants a hate response from everyone. Oh you want to sit there and watch the person on the hook for 5 seconds to make sure nobody will immediately sneak up and take them off? You get called a camping bitch. Oh you are trying out a killer for the first time and you only kill one person? HA HA NOOB FUCK YOU. It's like a bunch of little children play this game. The only other issue than that is players that are all stacked with ultra rare gear and perks that make it ridiculously hard for newer players to really do anything.
Even though it has endless of bugs, it is well worth the money. 20$ for (so far, and counting) 2020 hours of fun is not something many games can offer you.

First off, when your playing as killer against a full on swf, The game is no fun at all. why is it that a game that's was fun to begin with, to full on stressful sweaty swf players. The most you can do is watch them t-bag and point at you cause they know you wont catch them as they know how to loop.
Second- In the lobby after the game is finished, they act as if there so good, but as we know the game is very survivor sided cause of com's as having info on the killer the entire time is way to overpowered, oh and don't forget when they get very mad because you used crutch perks just to win and complain about it. 
I'm at my breaking point for this game, and to say how long i played (since beta). This game has potential, but i don't think the developers plan on changing or re-balancing the game majorly the right way anytime soon.
And please do not say (Then play survivor), Killer is my main, survivor i do play at times but in all honest is not as fun as killer when you get them moments when its not full on sweaty swf. If i was a dev, i would add some kind of penalty for swf that affects them while in the trail. Just want that feeling to make survivors terrified of killers and myself as survivor, like in the old days during beta.
Again play at your own risk.

I would list positives; but the list would be too long. So I will tell you the negatives.
Game is rampant with speed hackers as of 7/3. I personally haven't encountered one; but i've heard many many many complaints.
Killers are disgustingly underpowered.
"Balancing" team are very low ranks, therefor balances are catered towards lower ranking people.
It's tough for new players to get into the game due to the ranking system.

I know i've listed a good amount of cons; but even with them the game is very worth it. I would recommend waiting for a sale; but it's worth it regardless!

~~~~ Dead by Daylight ~~~~                  

  O que falar desse joguinho?

     Dead by Daylight é aquele tipo de jogo que vc ou ama e passa muuuitas horas jogando, ou você simplesmente odeia e pede reembolso na hora. Comigo aconteceu o primeiro caso (brigadoooooo senhor).
     Acho que o maior motivo de eu ainda gostar desse jogo é no que ele se tornou pra mim. Não foi só um jogo. Foi através dele que conheci pessoas que, sinceramente, não consigo me imaginar vivendo sem, e isso torna ele *muito* especial pra mim.

Mas confabulando sobre o jogo mesmo: É muito divertido; e como!
Se você curte jogos do tipo "Survival Horror / Co-op" vai definitivamente gostar do DbD.
Você pode escolher entre dois estilos de gameplay: Killer e Survivor, cada um com objetivos e mecânicas diferentes:

Survivor: Você joga com outros 3 sobreviventes, e juntos, precisam completar 5 geradores para dar energia aos portões de saída e escapar.
Killer: Você joga contra os 4 survivors, onde seu objetivo principal é impedir o progresso dos geradores e usar os ganchos do mapa para sacrificar os survivors.

Não quero discutir sobre balanceamento aqui. Mas posso dizer que o jogo tá beeem melhor que antigamente, e os desenvolvedores estão sempre atualizando e trazendo ideias novas pro jogo não ficar entediante.

Sobre a comunidade: Pois é, ela é bem tóxica. Mas qual não é, né? :|
Seja legal com os coleguinhas! Não queira estragar o dia de alguém sendo mau com ela.
Um "gg, vc é muito bom!" ou "nossa, por pouco!" são bem melhores que um "GG EZ GIT GUD". Se vc pode fazer da comunidade um lugar melhor, porque não? (◕‿◕✿)

Acho que é tudo que eu tinha pra falar sobre esse joguineo.
Sou péssimo em análises, então acho que vc mesmo deveria tirar sua própria conclusão sobre o game. A minha dica é: dê uma chance! 

É isso.   c:

我是16年万圣节促销的时候入的坑，那时候已经看直播看了很久了，很感兴趣。一开始只打屠夫，因为人类总是秒倒。后来玩的时间久了，逐步结识了一些玩的很好的前辈，是他们带我逐步深入这个游戏，从一个什么都不知道的萌新，渐渐学会了屠夫的藏红光，倒车，旋转刀；人类的极限内圈，LT，长短版。跟朋友们一起上分上段，在最短的时间内达到双1段，我也开始不在局限与只玩屠夫，因为当你上钩时其他素不相识的路人冒着自己搭进去的危险去救你的那种感动是在其他游戏里体会不到的，我深爱着这个游戏以及一起玩游戏的他们。后来几经版本更迭，当初带我玩的前辈们已经陆续都走了，我还继续跟朋友们坚守在这里；在杨永信出的时候，我真切感受到制作组是重视国内玩家的，这也更加坚定了我继续玩的信心；在上海WePlay见到制作组的成员也是让我觉得能入杀机，值了。后来版本开始偏向屠夫，渐渐开始觉得上段力不从心了，在那种顶配处决局下技术开始慢慢变得苍白无力。但这没什么，我跟车队开始常年混迹在低段位，算是炸鱼吧，但是至少玩着轻松一点，有萌新问我，我还是会推荐，告诉他们这游戏值得入，入门了还是挺好玩的。等前冲板被取消地形被削弱，血屋里的板区被减少，而屠夫的能力却越来越强，我已经不知不觉间减少打开这个游戏的次数了，体验太差。等这次更新后，我只是上去看了一下夹子的道具介绍，而再也没有一丝兴趣去点开始游戏了。

以上算是杀机生涯的一个总结吧，这次更新对我来说是压死骆驼的最后一根稻草。可能我也没玩多久，没有真正理解这个游戏的真谛吧，也实在不想在顶配局下去偷电，真的很累。本来还想等凤嘤嘤新皮肤的，看来是等不到了，游戏就压箱底吧，或许我还会回来看看。我不会骂制作组的，他们是一帮可爱的人，我宁愿相信制作组这样改有他们的道理，差评只是为了告诉今后的萌新，入坑要三思。
对不起制作组，我爱这个游戏，农场真的很美，但我真的累了，想停下来休息了
                                                                                                                             ——2018.7.25
